This Play, like its three predecessors in the same series, has been carefully expurgated for use in Schools.

It is hoped that the stage directions, which have been mainly suggested by practical experience at Westminster‚ may be of real service. As my opportunities of studying this aspect of the Play were unique, Ι have endeavoured to make this part of the edition as complete as possible.
